about.title: About Me
about.summary: Front-end Developer with over 2 years of experience in building fast, accessible, and scalable web applications. I enjoy transforming design concepts into functional UI using modern frameworks while adhering to strong architectural principles. Currently, I'm expanding my knowledge in system design, state management, and real-time architectures, particularly in the context of financial platforms. I'm always eager to learn and grow in my field.
